title: Front and Rear Baskets
content:
Front and Rear Baskets
Give your E-Bike new charm and especially practicality. The strong and weatherproof front basket with its classy rattan look completes the image of a contemporary roadster. It holds around 12 litres and can carry up to 5 kg of weight.
The pannier baskets can be fitted on the right and left, rather like panniers. This leaves the carrier free to be used for other things. Their large storage space of approx. 22 litres was designed to carry shopping bags each weighing up to 7 kg.
£243.00
